channel.title: Boken Engine
channel.description: This website is a virtual proof that I'm awesome

item.title: Iakkai Saga available on the App Store!
item.description: The first epsisode is available on App Store by Jose Celano - After some months of hard work we finally have published the first application built entirely using Boken Engine. You can find it on the App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1580924283#?platform=ipad Our our goals at the beginning of the project were: Try to build a complete demo using all Boken Engine features. Make it...

item.title: A challenging journey
item.description: The origins of Boken Engine by Fer TORR3S - Throughout 2020 we had to face a lot of challenges, so at the beginning of 2021 we were more than ready to face a new one, this time in the form of a new project, something none of us had ever been asked to do before. The idea was to...
